title: The Overwhelming Evidence of God | Daily Best of October 10 | Rick & Bubba
description:
On his trip to the edge of space on "Blue Origin," William Shatner is confronted with the emptiness of space and the beauty of Earth, but unfortunately he misses the point. The war in Ukraine is getting scarier by the day. In sports, college football is heating up, and we look at last weekend's games and the upcoming matchups. Tom Brady gets a monumental "roughing the passer" call in his favor. Speaking of football, concussion protocol has changed over the years, and Greg recounts all the times he got his "bell rung." (It was just concussions.) And lastly, Rick gives a telemarketer a taste of his own medicine.
Sponsor: Moink delivers grass-fed and grass-finished beef and lamb, pastured pork and chicken, and wild-caught Alaskan salmon, direct to your door - helping Family Farms become financially independent outside of big agriculture.Their animals are raised outdoors, their fish swim wild in the ocean, and Moink meat is free of antibiotics, hormones, sugar, and all the other junk you find pre-packaged in the meat aisle.
